resources.string: Something went wrong, please try again
Looks like there is an issue with your internet connection. Please check and try again
Are you sure you want to log out from this wallet?
You can’t use your current password as your new password
%1$d failed PIN attempts. Please provide password.
Password accepted. Please define new PIN.
0000 is an invalid PIN. Please try again.
PIN creation failed. Please pair device again.
You can’t use your current PIN as your new PIN
Your account has been locked temporarily as a precaution. Please check your email for more information and try again later.
Blockchain Wallet cannot obtain an Internet connection. Please check the connectivity on your device and try again.
Unable to connect to server, please try again later.
Double encrypt password error. Please try again.
Log in to your Blockchain Wallet via your PC or Mac at %1$s.
The easy way to send, receive, store and trade digital currencies.
Click Show Pairing Code to reveal a QR Code, a square black & white barcode. Scan the code with your camera.
You should always pair or login if you have access to your Wallet ID and password. Recovering your funds may create a new Wallet ID. Would you like to continue?
Enter your 12 backup words with spaces to recover your funds & transactions
Invalid Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase. Please try again
Restoring wallet failed. Please try again
I understand that Blockchain.com cannot recover my password for me. If I lose access to my Wallet, I must use my Secret Phrase to access my funds.
By creating an account, you agree to Blockchain’s Terms of Service & Privacy Policy.
Use at least 8 characters, a mix of letters, numbers and symbols.
With BitPay, you can now use your Blockchain wallet for purchases with supporting retailers.
Unable to retrieve BitPay invoice. Has it expired?
Blockchain Wallet %1$s\n©%2$s Blockchain Luxembourg S.A.\nAll rights reserved.
Enter using your password or forget this wallet
This will leave the app and take you to your browser. Continue?
The selected password is too weak to secure your funds. Please define a different password.
Press back button again to exit
Your address has been imported successfully. Optionally assign a friendly display name to this address.
Copy this receive address to the clipboard? If so, be advised that other applications may be able to look at this information.
Share this receive address for sending? If so, be advised that other applications may be able to look at this information.
Copy your Wallet ID to the clipboard? If so, be advised that other applications may be able to look at this information.
Secure connection to the host has failed. This might indicate malicious activity. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.
Please check your email to approve this login attempt.
Enhanced privacy through hierarchical deterministic addresses.
Customize the way you organize your Bitcoin in your Blockchain Wallet.
Hey, we’ve added these new features to your Blockchain wallet:
Your wallet is upgrading, please be patient this may take some time depending on the size and age of your wallet.
You are now running the most secure and private Blockchain Wallet. You may continue to your wallet now.
There was an error upgrading your wallet. Please try again later.
Your Blockchain Wallet installation is incomplete. Please re-pair your wallet or create a new one.
The camera is currently opened by another application. Please close other application and try again.
Camera could not be opened. Please check your permissions
Your password has been changed, please re-pair your wallet

Your verified email address is used to send login codes when suspicious or unusual activity is detected, to remind you of your wallet login ID, and to send bitcoin payment alerts when you receive funds.

Your device appears to be rooted. Be advised that storing funds on a rooted device is unsafe and, in addition, can cause stability issues. If you continue to use our Bitcoin wallet on this device we recommend that you use double encryption on your Blockchain account.
We are unable to connect to the host to establish a secure connection. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.

This item has been archived, and is inaccessible in the mobile app experience. Though you cannot send funds from this item, any funds will remain safe. Simply unarchive this item to start using it again.
This item is not archived. Archive this item if you do NOT want to use it anymore. Your funds will remain safe, and you can unarchive it at anytime.
This item is set as your default and can’t be archived.
Your xPub is an advanced feature that contains all of your public addresses.
Sharing your xPub authorizes others to track your transaction history. As authorized persons may be able to disrupt you from accessing your wallet, only share your xPub with people you trust.
Give this new wallet a name.
Give this new wallet a name.
Are you sure you want to archive this item?
Are you sure you want to unarchive this item?
Importing a non-spendable address (an address or public key script without the corresponding private key) is not supported. Please try again with an address and private key.

If you are a merchant, show your xPub and use the Blockchain Merchant app to receive funds safely and privately.\n\nKeep your xPub private. Someone with access to your xPub will be able to see all your funds and transactions.
Keep your xPub private. Someone with access to your xPub will be able to see all your funds and transactions.
Imported addresses are not backed up by your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase. To secure these funds, we recommend transferring these balances to your Blockchain.com non-custodial Wallet.
A new device is attempting to access your Blockchain.com Wallet. Approve or Deny now.
We noticed a login attempt from a device you don’t usually use.
If this was you, approve the device below. If you do not recognize this device, deny & block the device now.
You cannot approve this request unless both devices are on the same network.
Your wallet is safe. We have blocked this device from logging into your wallet.
Logging you in on the web now.
Please disable 2-step Verification via SMS in the security settings first.
Please login to your wallet in the web browser to disable 2FA.
Error updating settings, please try again
We have sent your mobile phone an SMS message with a verification code. Enter the code to verify your mobile phone number.
Your mobile phone can be used to enable two-factor authentication, helping to secure your wallet from unauthorized access.
Notifications related to Two Factor Authentication
Block IP addresses that are known to be part of the Tor anonymizing network. The Tor network is frequently used by hackers attempting to access Blockchain user’s wallets.
Store the encrypted backup in your Google Drive account, if available. This allows you to restore your wallet if you lose this device.
Some screens within the application can display sensitive data. Other applications will be able to access these screenshots.

Your password is never shared with our servers, which means we cannot help reset your password if you forget it. Make sure you backup your funds from the side menu which can restore access to your wallet in the event of a lost password.
We have sent your email address a verification link. Click the link to verify your email address.
Get notified when you receive bitcoin.
Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification.

Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification. You can choose to use your mobile phone number to secure your wallet. This code will be requested when you try to access your wallet via the web browser.\n\nIn order to use other authentication methods instead, please login to our web wallet at %1$s
Enjoying the Blockchain Wallet? Please take a moment to leave a review in Google Play and let others know about it.
You’re about to remove your %1$s Account
There was an issue while removing your bank, please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
Please send %1$s BTC to the Bitcoin address %2$s.
Please send BCH to the Bitcoin Cash address %1$s.
Please send XLM to the Stellar address %1$s.
Tap to copy this address. Share it with the sender via email or text.
The PIN you have selected is extremely common and may be easily guessed by someone with access to your phone within 3 tries. Would you like to use this PIN anyway?
You have logged out or there was an error decrypting your wallet. Enter your password below to login.
If you would like to forget this wallet and start over, press ’Forget Wallet’.
This will erase all wallet data on this device. Please confirm you have your wallet information saved elsewhere otherwise any bitcoin in this wallet will be inaccessible!!
Unable to connect to server. Please try again later.
This is an oversized bitcoin transaction. Your wallet needs to consolidate many smaller payments you’ve received in the past. This requires a relatively high fee in order to be confirmed quickly.
Enable notifications to receive a popup notification whenever you receive bitcoin.
In crypto, when you hold the private keys, you\'re in control of the funds in your Private Key Wallet. The downside is that WHOEVER holds your private keys can control your Private Key Wallet.
1. Write down the 12 word phrase on the next screen in the exact order it appears
2. Keep it safe, ideally on a securely stored piece of paper (in other words, not a digital copy).
3. NEVER share your backup phrase with anyone.
Warning: If someone has your backup phrase they will have access to your Private Key Wallet and can withdraw funds.
Blockchain.com will never ask to view or receive your recovery phrase.
It is important to make sure you write down your words exactly as they appear here and in this order.

You can use your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase to restore your funds if you lose your password. Anyone with access to your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase can access your funds so remember to keep it offline somewhere safe and secure.
Enter the following words from your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase to complete the backup process.
Lost your 12 word Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase?
Use your biometrics to log into the Wallet
Use your biometrics for faster, easier access to your wallet.\n\nConfirm it’s you to continue
Are you sure you want to disable biometric login?
No fingerprints have been registered to this device yet. Do you want to register a fingerprint now?
Either the biometrics stored on this device have changed or the keyguard has been disabled. Please use your PIN instead.\n\nYou can then set up Biometric Login again from Settings.
Either the biometrics stored on this device have changed or the keyguard has been disabled.\n\nPlease re-add your biometrics and try again.
There have been too many failed attempts. Please log in using your PIN instead.

Something went wrong while trying to use biometrics, please use your PIN instead.

You can then set up Biometric Login again from Settings.
Error: %1$s
You have failed too many attempts to authenticate, please wait 30 seconds and try again
Your biometrics sensors are disabled, please lock your device and un-lock it using your PIN, Pattern or Password to re-enable them.\n\nOnce this is done, please try again.
Quickly sign into your wallet instead of using your PIN.
Copy receive address to another app
View QR code for receive address
Sorry, there was an error generating the QR code
Reveal a receive address when you long-press on the app icon in the launcher, making receiving bitcoin even faster.
Reveal a receive address when you swipe left on the PIN screen, making receiving funds even faster.
Five addresses will be loaded consecutively, after which logging in is required to show new addresses.
No more addresses can be loaded right now. Log in to the app to load more.
Use biometric login instead of your PIN to authenticate and access your wallet.
Look for an email from Blockchain and click the verification link to complete your wallet setup.
Please enter a valid 2FA code from your authenticator app to continue.
We have just sent you an SMS containing a 2FA code. Please enter it here to continue.
Exceeded retries, please wait 60 seconds before trying again
To use this service, we require you to enter your second password.
To keep using Buy & Sell, you’ll need to update your profile. Once completed, you’ll also unlock higher trading limits in Swap.
Error loading full wallet functionality. Service might temporarily be unavailable.
Could not load %1$s at this time
Failed to load chart details, please try again
Failed to load wallet details, please try again
Failed to exchange rate information, please try again
There is already a transaction in progress, please wait until it completes
The version of the app you are using is no longer supported. Please update the app and try again.
Are you sure this is a Bitcoin Cash address?
Sending funds to a bitcoin address by accident will result in loss of funds.
Warning! This is the testnet3 blockchain.
Your XLM has already been claimed.
We’re sorry, the airdrop program is currently not available where you are.
Looks like you’ve already received your airdrop!
We’re sorry, the XLM airdrop is over. Complete your profile to be eligible for future airdrops and access trading.
Oops! We had trouble processing your airdrop. Please try again.
There’s a new way to trade. Link your Wallet for instant access.
Our Exchange will be able to:
Sync addresses with your Wallet so you can securely sweep crypto between accounts
Share your Gold or Silver Level status for unlimited trading
Access the crypto in your wallet, access your keys, or view your password.
A new window should open within 10 seconds.
We just sent you a verification email. Your email address needs to be verified before you can connect to the Exchange.
Email sent. Check your inbox to continue.
Something went wrong. Please tap Send Again.
You’re all set to connect your Blockchain Wallet to the Exchange.
We could not connect your Wallet to the Exchange. Please go back to the Exchange and try again.
You have connected your Blockchain Wallet to the Exchange. Go back and finish signing up!
Here are a few tips to get your wallet up and running. We’ll also help you make sure everything is secure.
In order to start using your Blockchain wallet, you need to confirm your email address.
Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification.
You can now backup your wallet securely to the cloud. You can opt-out of backups in your wallet settings.
We can help you buy in just a few simple steps.
Select the crypto you want to buy, verify your identity and buy instantly.
Deposit crypto in your wallet to get started. It’s the best way to store your crypto while keeping control of your keys.
You control your crypto. Write down your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase to restore all your funds in case you lose your password.
You’re almost done signing up for your Blockchain.com Wallet. Once you finish and get approved, start buying crypto.
Once we receive your bank transfer, your buy order will be complete.
Enable biometrics to quickly log into your wallet instead of using your PIN.
Sell directly from your Trading Wallets to your Cash Wallet.
Earn interest on your crypto today!
Transfer Crypto and start earning Interest on BTC, ETH and many more.
Wrapped Digital Gold (wDGLD) is an ERC-20 tokenized version of DGLD, combining a gold-backed token with the power and flexibility of Ethereum.
Aave, YFI and DOT now available!
Aave, YFI and Polkadot tokens are now available to Buy, Sell, Swap and Send in your Wallet.
You can send money directly to registered Unstoppable and ENS domains. Send crypto to .crypto, .eth, .xyz extensions and many more!
Own your digital identity and data with hundreds of decentralized apps built with Blockstack.
Stacks (STX) are stored in your Blockchain Wallet. Please note the balance is currently non-transferable.

When you buy crypto, we store your funds securely on your behalf in a crypto Trading Account. You can keep them safe with us or transfer them to your Private Key (or non-custodial) Wallet to own and store yourself.

Your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase will allow you to recover your crypto if you lose access to your wallet. \n\nPlease write down these 12 words in order and keep them somewhere safe. Never share it with anyone. Your Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase is the key to recovering your crypto if you ever get locked out.

resources.string: Announcing Swap by Blockchain - the faster, smarter way to trade your crypto.
By tapping Submit, you agree to Blockchain’s
Every country has different rules on trading cryptocurrencies.
Every state has different rules on trading cryptocurrencies.
Why do we need this information?
We need this to verify your identity in order for you to use this improved feature. It should only take a couple of minutes.
Error creating user details, try again later
A user already exists with this email address
Every country has different rules on how to buy and sell cryptocurrencies. Keep your eyes peeled, and we’ll let you know as soon as we launch in %1$s!
What is my address used for?
This information is only used to help us verify your identity.
Google Play Services are not available on this device.
Error saving address, please try again
We need to verify your email address as an added layer of security.
Error saving email, please try again
We just sent you an email with further instructions.
This will help us to verify your identity today, and also keep your account secure in the future. To do this an SMS will be sent to your phone with a verification code.
Error saving mobile number, please try again
Verification code incorrect. Please double check the code we sent you and try again.
Error sending Code, please try again
Not all countries are supported at this time. Check our up to date list of countries before proceeding.
You’ll need 1 of the ID types below to continue.
Please allow your Blockchain App access your camera to upload your ID and take a Selfie.
Error verifying ID, please try again
You successfully submitted your information. Your account is now in review!
Our Blockchain Support Team has written Help Guides explaining why we need to verify your identity.
Your information is being reviewed. When it all looks good, you’re clear to exchange. You should receive a notification within 5 minutes.
Congratulations! We successfully verified your identity. You can now exchange cryptocurrencies at Blockchain.
Unfortunately we had some trouble verifying your identity with the documents you’ve supplied and your account can’t be verified at this time.
We had some trouble verifying your account with the documents provided. Our support team will contact you shortly to resolve this.
We’ll let you know as soon as your identity has been verified.
We Need Some More Information to Complete Your Profile
You’ll need to verify your phone number. provide a government issued ID and a Selfie.
Pick up where you left off and complete your identity verification.
We had some issues with the documents you’ve supplied. Please try uploading the documents again to continue with your verification.
We are unable to verify your identity and need you to re upload the required documents.
Main reasons for this to happen:
The document you submitted is incorrect.
We were unable to read the images you submitted due to image quality.
Your information is being reviewed. The review should complete shortly.
You can buy & sell bitcoin (BTC) using your credit card or bank account through our partner Coinify.
By tapping Begin Now, you agree to Coinify’s
Trading your crypto doesn’t mean trading away control
Swap by Blockchain enables you to trade crypto with best prices, and quick settlement, all while maintaining full control of your funds.
Your stacks are now in your wallet. We’ll let you know as soon as these are available to be used.
A Reward for Being Gold Level
We’re airdropping you free crypto in 2020
By completing the Gold Level requirements you are automatically eligible for our airdrop program.
Your Swap Limit is the maximum amount of crypto you can trade
We had trouble verifying your identity. Your Swap feature has been disabled at this time.
Your %1$s verification is currently being reviewed by a Blockchain Support Member
Requires Email, Name, Date of Birth and Address
Requires Silver level, Govt. ID and a Portrait Photo
If you want to learn more about our verification process visit our Support Center.
If you’re Silver verified you can trade your crypto in Swap.
We’re sorry we can’t verify you for Gold. This can be for a number of reasons, for example your country might not be supported right now.
Keep track of your crypto balances from your Wallet’s dashboard. Your Wallet currently supports Bitcoin, Ether, Bitcoin Cash, Stellar XLM and USD Digital.
Send crypto anywhere, anytime. All you need is the recipient’s crypto address.
To receive crypto to your wallet, get a unique address for each crypto here that you can share with the sender.
Blockchain Wallet cannot be run on this device.
Own Crypto in a Few Minutes
We can help you buy in just a few simple steps.
Verify your identity and buy crypto
Your local currency to store funds in that currency as funds in your Blockchain Wallet.
What would you like to buy?
We sent an email to %1$s with a verification link. Didn’t get it? Check your spam folder.
Send funds directly from your bank account to your Blockchain.com Wallet. Bank fees may apply.
Securely link a bank and send cash to your Blockchain.com Wallet at anytime.
Instantly buy crypto with any Visa or Mastercard.
Send funds directly from your bank to your Blockchain Wallet. Once we receive the manual transfer, use that cash to buy crypto.
Once we receive your funds, we’ll start your %1$s buy order. Note, your final amount might change to due market activity. Fees may apply.
Your final amount might change due to market activity.
Your crypto will be available to be withdrawn within
Usually takes less than a minute.
You’ve successfully submitted your application. A Blockchain Support Member will review your information.
Your identity has been successfully verified. You’re now Gold Level and can trade up to $25000 a day. \n\n Buy is not available in your region yet, we’ll let you know as soon as this happens.
Securely transfer %1$s from your bank account to Blockchain. Depending on the transfer method and availability of funds, this may take up to 1 business day.
Please transfer %1$s from your bank account to Blockchain.com. Once we receive the funds, we’ll create your %2$s buy order.
Your Recipient name above must match the account holder’s name on your bank account for your transfer to be successful. Your transfer could be rejected if there is not a match.

Your Recipient name above must match the account holder’s name on your bank account for your transfer to be successful. Your transfer could be rejected if there is not a match.\n\nBy depositing funds to this account, you agree to Terms & Conditions of Modulr, our banking partner.
By depositing funds to this account, you agree to Terms & Conditions of Modulr, our banking partner.
Only send funds from a bank account in your name. If not, your deposit could be delayed or rejected.
This will remove your %1$s Buy order.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Let’s get your wallet set up. You can quickly buy crypto now or do this later.
Something went wrong while loading the transfer details.\n\nPlease try again later.
You have no eligible Wallets to perform this action.
This could take up to 1 minute.
Don’t worry. Your money is safe. Please try again or contact our Suppport Team for help.
We’ll notify you when your order is complete.
We are completing your purchase now. Expect the funds to be withdrawn from your bank by %1$s. Check the status of your order at anytime in Activity.
Your order is being processed, we will let you know when its done. You can safely close this screen while we update the order in the background.
Your %1s is now available in your Wallet.
At this time, we don’t support buying crypto with virtual credit and debit cards. You must use a physical card’s number, date and security code.
Currently we don’t support buying crypto with %1s
All your transactions will show up here.
Failed to load activity, please try again later
Looks like your wallets are empty, we can help you buy crypto
There was an error loading your wallets, please try again later
This card has already been saved.
Only send funds from a bank account in your name. If not, your deposit could be delayed or rejected.
Funds will be credited to your EUR wallet as soon as we receive them. SEPA transfers usually take around 1 business day to reach us.
Funds will be credited to your GBP wallet as soon as we receive them. In the UK Faster Payments Network, this can take a couple of hours.
We were unable to load our bank deposit details.
You already have a Withdrawal in progress, please wait until that completes before starting a new one.
We are sending the cash now. Expect the cash to hit your bank on %1$s. Check the status of your Withdrawal at anytime from your Activity Screen
Your %1$s will be available in your %2$s within 2 days.
Verify your identity to deposit cash into the Wallet and buy crypto.
Verify your identity to deposit cash into your Wallet. Buy & Sell crypto. Withdraw at any time.

Transfer cash from your bank and enable your cash balances.
Use your cash wallet as a payment method to buy BTC, ETH, XLM & more.
Link a Bank to Buy Crypto
Hold cash in your Blockchain.com Wallet. Deposit and Withdraw at anytime.
Select the Wallet you want to send from.
Select a Wallet to receive crypto to.
Please enter your 2nd password, you will then be able to continue sending.
Success! We’re are withdrawing the cash from your %1$s Wallet now. The funds should be in your bank in 1–3 business days.

Functionality to withdraw DOT from your trading wallet is currently unavailable, but coming soon.

Not enough funds for current fee level.

While we wait for your bank to send the cash, here’s early access to %1$s in your %2$s Cash Account so you can buy crypto right away.\n\nYour funds will be available to withdraw once the bank transfer is complete on %3$s.
Please wait while we confirm the transaction. You can safely close this, and check the progress under the Activity tab.
Oops, it took too long to confirm the transaction!
Payments can sometimes take a while to go through. If you approved the transaction, you can safely close this, and check the Deposit progress under the Activity tab.

For your security, first time card purchases are subject to a %1$s day holding period before you can send or withdraw your purchased crypto. We will notify you when the hold is lifted.\n\nIn the meantime, you can sell into Cash, swap, and trade within Blockchain.com.
Your final amount might change due to market activity. An initial hold period of %s days will be applied to your funds. You can Buy, Sell, and Swap during this period.

Note: You will not be able to Send or Withdraw these funds from your Wallet for the next %1$s days.

We’ve updated Swap with a new look and better experience.
Faster. Cheaper. Better. Our new Swap experience lets you exchange crypto in fewer taps.
Link your bank and instantly buy crypto at anytime.
Blockchain.com uses Yodlee to verify your bank credentials & securely link your accounts.
Yodlee securely stores your credentials adhering to leading industry practices for data security, regulatory compliance and privacy.\n Learn more
This could take up to 30 seconds.
Taking you back to your Wallet…
